body_html:
It makes sense. Broadcasting will make the output be of size (500000, 500000, 1) because it aligns dims to the right (not to the left)

500000         1    1
          500000    1
---------------------
500000    500000    1
body_text:
It makes sense. Broadcasting will make the output be of size (500000, 500000, 1) because it aligns dims to the right (not to the left)
500000         1    1
          500000    1
---------------------
500000    500000    1
body:
It makes sense. Broadcasting will make the output be of size (500000, 500000, 1) because it aligns dims to the right (not to the left)
```
500000         1    1
          500000    1
---------------------
500000    500000    1
```
